CmdLine: set -ex;                 apt-get update;         apt-get install -y                 unzip                 wget                 libjpeg-dev                 libpng12-dev         ;         rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;                 docker-php-ext-configure gd --with-png-dir=/usr --with-jpeg-dir=/usr;         docker-php-ext-install gd mysqli opcache

CmdLine: {                 echo 'opcache.memory_consumption=128';                 echo 'opcache.interned_strings_buffer=8';                 echo 'opcache.max_accelerated_files=4000';                 echo 'opcache.revalidate_freq=2';                 echo 'opcache.fast_shutdown=1';                 echo 'opcache.enable_cli=1';         } > /usr/local/etc/php/conf.d/opcache-recommended.ini

CmdLine: set -ex;         curl -o wordpress.tar.gz -fSL "https://wordpress.org/wordpress-${WORDPRESS_VERSION}.tar.gz";         echo "$WORDPRESS_SHA1 *wordpress.tar.gz" | sha1sum -c -;         tar -xzf wordpress.tar.gz -C /usr/src/;         rm wordpress.tar.gz;         chown -R www-data:www-data /usr/src/wordpress
